title: The doctrine of fasting and praier, and humiliation for sinne Delivered in sundry sermons at the fast appointed by publique authority, in the yeere 1625. By that late faithfull and worthy minister of Iesus Christ. Arth. Hildersam.
author: Hildersam, Arthur, 1563-1632.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by George Miller, for Edward Brewster, and are to be sold at his shop at the great north-doore of S. Pauls at the signe of the Bible,
